name: postcondition
content: InvBrTSize = max(InvasiveTumourSize) and ERIHC = if(((EstrogenReceptorLevelCode includes "Positive") or (max(EstrogenReceptorScore) >= 3)), "ER positive", if((EstrogenReceptorLevelCode includes "NEGATIVE" and not(EstrogenReceptorLevelCode includes "Positive") and max(EstrogenReceptorScore) <= 2), "ER negative", "ER undetermined")) and PAxLNHE = max(PositiveLymphNodesNumber) and HisGrade = if(max(InvasiveTumourGradeCode) = "03 High", "High grade GIII", if(max(InvasiveTumourGradeCode) = "02 Intermediate", "Intermediate grade GII", if(max(InvasiveTumourGradeCode) = "01 Low", "Low grade GI", "Undetermined GX"))) and PRIHC = if(((ProgesteronReceptorLevel includes "Positive") or (max(ProgesteronReceptorScore) >= 3)), "PR positive", if((ProgesteronReceptorLevel includes "NEGATIVE" and not(ProgesteronReceptorLevel includes "Positive") and max(ProgesteronReceptorScore) <= 2), "PR negative", "PR undetermined")) and nationality = "UK"
author: DA
